ValidationRule.description:
Campaign fields required on creation:
All Fields in Campaign Information (Description, Parent Campaign, Business Owner, Type, Business, Start Date, End Date and Language) Expected Revenue in Campaign and Budgeted Cost in Campaign
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( $Setup.Bypass_Settings__c.Bypass_Validation_Rules__c ), OR( ISBLANK(Description), ISBLANK(ParentId), ISBLANK(Business_Owner__c), ISPICKVAL(Type,''), ISPICKVAL(Business__c,''), ISBLANK(StartDate), ISBLANK(EndDate), ISPICKVAL(Language__c,''), ISBLANK(ExpectedRevenue), ISBLANK(BudgetedCost) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Required Fields in Campaign: Description, Parent Campaign, Business Owner, Type, Business, Start Date, End Date, Language, Expected Revenue in Campaign and Budgeted Cost in Campaign
